content: an easy quick pattern for an elongated triangular shawl eyelets garter stitch and a chain stitch are used to add texture and interest it works well for a skein with a long color change or gradation it can be easily adjusted for other yarn weights by adjusting needle size and knitting additional repeats to increase the size of the shawl gauge is not critical for this project find a fabric that you like and go for it i used a us 9 needle with schoppel wolle gradient dk and a us 10 5 with berrocco estiva bulky
